text: Just wondering if there are any plans to enable smart rules on modules other than rich text in the future?

Hey Rohan, this is something on our radar (as we have had many requests for this). We don’t have a definite timeline on this but we are looking into it :slightly_smiling_face:
(cc <@U8THBCFC4>)

Can confirm! It’s actively being worked on currently :slightly_smiling_face: and we’re making good progress. I’ll post in <#CEQQ9NFK2|releases-and-updates> once it’s ready! I think (no guarantees though) that it’ll be something we see released before end of year
